title: No structure including varandah or balcony shall be allowed to be erected or re-erected or any additions or alterations made to a building on a site within the distance quoted in Table No
clause_text: No structure including varandah or balcony shall be allowed to be erected or re-erected or any additions or alterations made to a building on a site within the distance quoted in Table No.3 below in accordance with the prevailing Indian Electricity Rules and its amendments from time to time between the building and any overhead electric supply line.
section: Distance of Site from Electric Lines

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
